DOC.brief_summary: This observational study investigates the effects of epimacular membrane peeling on the structure and function of the retina.
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Epimacular Gliosis Must be scheduled for ILMpeeling independently of study Must be older then 18 years of age Visual acuity > 0,4 logMAR (< 20/50 EDTRS) Other ophthalmological disorder affecting visual acuity and/or visual field and/or retinal structure
